Replace.Text: 在古典时期解锁。允许建造“银行”的强力替代品：“镀金宝库”。
在文艺复兴时期解锁。+1通配符政策槽位。+2间谍容量。您的间谍处于本方城市的领土中时，城市每回合+4忠诚度、+1 [ICON_Amenities] 宜居度。
在现代解锁。每回合您将获得等同于国库3%的 [ICON_Gold] 金币收入。攻击性间谍任务成功后，您还将获得目标城市在此回合获得的 [ICON_Science] 科技值、[ICON_Culture] 文化值、[ICON_Gold] 金币和 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值的一半。
发现自然奇观后解锁。在地图上显示“地脉”资源。地脉能为所有专业化区域带来大量相邻加成。
在古典时期解锁。允许建造“大学”的强力替代品：“炼金术会所”。
在文艺复兴时期解锁。每获得一名 [ICON_GreatPerson] 伟人，地脉便获得等同于此 [ICON_GreatPerson] 伟人区域类型的+2产出。[ICON_GreatAdmiral] 海军统帅和 [ICON_GreatGeneral] 大将军获得+2 [ICON_Science] 科技值。
在现代解锁。解锁“秘术研究”。此城市项目在进行时将提供 [ICON_GOLD] 金币。完成时，其将根据城市中的地脉数量提供 [ICON_GreatPerson] 伟人点数和 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值。
在古典时期解锁。城市每回合获得等同于其每回合所获 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值20%的 [ICON_Gold] 金币、[ICON_Science] 信仰值和 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。
在文艺复兴时期解锁。解锁单位“邪教徒”。此单位用 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值购买，可消耗次数来降低外国城市的忠诚度，并生成 [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] 虚空遗物。
在现代解锁。解锁“黑暗召唤”。此城市项目在进行时可提供大量 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值，完成后可提升邪教徒造成的忠诚度损失。
在古典时期解锁。[ICON_Capital] 首都将出现1个吸血鬼单位，允许吸血鬼建造吸血鬼城堡（帝国中最多可建造2座）。
在文艺复兴时期解锁。[ICON_Capital] 首都将出现1个吸血鬼单位。将吸血鬼城堡建造上限提升至3座。您的吸血鬼现在能恐吓相邻的敌方单位，使其 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力-5。进行掠夺将消耗吸血鬼1点 [ICON_Movement] 移动力。
在现代解锁。[ICON_Capital] 首都将出现1个吸血鬼单位。将吸血鬼城堡建造上限提升至4座。您吸血鬼城堡1单元格范围中的单位现在能瞬移至帝国其中一座吸血鬼城堡附近的任意单元格。
Unlocked in Classical Era. Allows you to construct the Gilded Vault building, a powerful replacement of the Bank.
Unlocked in Renaissance Era. +1 Wildcard policy slot. +2 Spy capacity. Your cities gain +4 Loyalty per turn and +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity when your Spy is in their territory.

Unlocked in Modern Era. Every turn, you earn 3% of the [ICON_Gold] Gold in your treasury as income. Whenever an offensive spy mission is successful, you also gain half of the [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, [ICON_Gold] Gold, and [ICON_Faith] Faith that the targeted city earned that turn.
Unlocked by discovering a Natural Wonder. Reveals the Ley Line resource on the map. Ley Lines give a large adjacency bonus to all specialty districts.
Unlocked in Classical Era. Allows you to construct the Alchemical Society building, a powerful replacement of the University.

Unlocked in Renaissance Era. For every [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person earned Ley Lines receive +2 yield equal to that [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person's district type. [ICON_GreatAdmiral] Great Admirals and [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great Generals earn +2 [ICON_Science] Science.

Unlocked in Modern Era. Unlocks Occult Research, a city project that provides [ICON_GOLD] Gold while active. When completed, it grants [ICON_GreatPerson] Great People points, and [ICON_SCIENCE] Science for every Ley Line in the city.
Unlocked in Classical Era. Cities earn [ICON_Gold] Gold, [ICON_Science] Science, and [ICON_Culture] Culture per turn equal to 20% of their [ICON_Faith] Faith per turn rate.

Unlocked in Renaissance Era. Unlocks the Cultist unit. This unit is purchased with [ICON_Faith] Faith, and uses charges to reduce Loyalty in foreign cities and generate [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relics of the Void.
Unlocked in Modern Era. Unlocks Dark Summoning, a city project that provides lots of [ICON_Faith] Faith while active, and upon completion raises the amount of Loyalty damage done by Cultists.
Unlocked in Classical Era. Grants a Vampire unit in your [ICON_Capital] Capital, and allows your Vampires to construct Vampire Castles (maximum two per empire).

Unlocked in Renaissance Era. Grants a Vampire unit in your [ICON_Capital] Capital. Increases maximum Vampire Castle builds to three. Your Vampires now Intimidate adjacent enemy units, reducing their [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength by 5. Pillaging now costs Vampires 1 [ICON_Movement] Movement.

Unlocked in Modern Era. Grants a Vampire unit in your [ICON_Capital] Capital. Increases maximum Vampire Castle builds to four. Units within one tile of your Vampire Castles may now Airlift to any other tile near one of your Vampire Castles.
黄金黎明协会专属，替代大学。此学院区域将生成等同于其 [ICON_Science] 科技值相邻加成的 [ICON_Gold] 金币。[NEWLINE][ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力和 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值加成延伸到4个单元格中的每个市中心(此加成每座城市仅能应用1次)。

Unique to the Hermetic Order, replaces the University. This Campus district generates [ICON_Gold] Gold equal to its [ICON_Science] Science adjacency bonus. [NEWLINE]Bonus [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and [ICON_SCIENCE] Science extends to each city center within 4 tiles. This bonus applies once to a city.
弥涅耳瓦夜鹰专属，替代银行。这个商业中心将提供等同于其 [ICON_Gold] 金币相邻加成的 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值。[NEWLINE]其 [ICON_Gold] 金币加成延伸到4单元格内的所有市中心（前提是其尚未从其他的此建筑获得加成）。[NEWLINE]若此城市 [ICON_Citizen] 人口数量不少于20，则+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线容量。

Unique to the Owls of Minerva, replaces the Bank. This Commercial Hub generates [ICON_CULTURE] Culture equal to its [ICON_Gold] Gold adjacency bonus. [NEWLINE]Its [ICON_Gold] Gold bonus is extended to all City Centers within 4 tiles that do not already have a bonus from this building type. [NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] if city has no less than 20 [ICON_Citizen] citizens.
